name: BodyTrackedEntity
desc: An entity used to animate a virtual character in an AR scene by tracking a real person.

items.desc: The body-tracking component for the body-tracked entity.

items.name: struct BodyTrackingComponent
items.desc: A component for tracking people in an AR session.

items.name: protocol HasBodyTracking
items.desc: An interface that enables the animation of a virtual character by tracking a real person in AR.

items.name: var model: ModelComponent?
items.desc: The model component for the entity.

items.name: struct ModelComponent
items.desc: A collection of resources that create the visual appearance of an entity.
